movies.title: The Negro
movies.plot: In the middle of the night, in the Quebec countryside, all hell breaks loose as a black teenager is caught smashing a racially denigrating lawn ornament. Together the neighbours attend to justice against the vandal. Thorough the night there is mounting racism, fueled by alcohol, and violence. Le Nèg' opens the morning after when the police investigators arrive at the scene to take depositions.
movies.simplePlot: In the middle of the night, in the Quebec countryside, all hell breaks loose as a black teenager is caught smashing a racially denigrating lawn ornament. Together the neighbours attend to ...

biography.bio: Iannicko N'Doua-Légaré is an actor and director, known for The Negro (2002), Starbuck (2011) and Hivernam (2002).
biography.name: Iannicko N'Doua-Légaré

biography.bio: Robin Aubert is an actor and director, known for The Countess of Baton Rouge (1997), The Negro (2002) and Miraculum (2014).
biography.name: Robin Aubert

biography.bio: Emmanuel Bilodeau was born on August 29, 1964 in Hull, Québec, Canada. He is an actor, known for The Revenant (2015), Curling (2010) and Taking Lives (2004).
biography.name: Emmanuel Bilodeau

biography.bio: Vincent Bilodeau was born on August 11, 1951 in Québec, Québec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Soft Shell Man (2001), The Negro (2002) and Chaos and Desire (2002).
biography.name: Vincent Bilodeau

biography.bio: Sandrine Bisson was born on June 22, 1975 in Quebec City, Quebec, Canada. She is an actress, known for 1987 (2014), 1981 (2009) and The Negro (2002).
biography.name: Sandrine Bisson

biography.bio: Jean-Guy Bouchard is an actor, known for The Whole Nine Yards (2000), Requiem pour un beau sans-coeur (1992) and French Immersion (2011).
biography.name: Jean-Guy Bouchard

biography.bio: Claude Despins is an actor, known for The Score (2001), 1981 (2009) and Tu Dors Nicole (2014).
biography.name: Claude Despins

biography.bio: René-Daniel Dubois is an actor and writer, known for 5150 rue des Ormes (2009), Contre toute espérance (2007) and The Little Queen (2014).
biography.name: René-Daniel Dubois

biography.bio: Suzanne Lemoine is an actress, known for The Fight (2007), The Negro (2002) and C'est congé aujourd'hui (1984).
biography.name: Suzanne Lemoine

biography.bio: Béatrice Picard was born on July 3, 1929. She is an actress, known for Ma tante Aline (2007), Le scaphandrier (2015) and The Negro (2002).
biography.name: Béatrice Picard

biography.bio: Isabelle Vincent is an actress, known for Catimini (2012), Gabrielle (2013) and Tout ce que tu possèdes (2012).
biography.name: Isabelle Vincent

biography.bio: Sylvio Archambault is known for his work on Whitewash (2013), Gangsterland (2010) and Les mauvaises herbes (2016).
biography.name: Sylvio Archambault

biography.bio: Mostly known as an actress, Dorothée always had a strong passion for Jazz. She participated at "elles chantent" project in 2000, a project were many people were invited to sing their favorite songs. Dorothée is mostly known for her acting in movies Les invasions barbares, Le violon rouge and Jack Paradise. She also participated in many Quebeker TV shows such as Les dames de coeur, Terre humaine, La vie la vie, Tribu.com and Cauchemar d'amour. While traveling in New York in the 90's, she felt in love with Jazz. Back in Montréal, she gave many concerts in de club "au sofa". She event gave concert at the Festival de jazz de Montréal in 1999. Her first album was in 2000.
biography.name: Dorothée Berryman

biography.bio: Serge Bradet is an actor, known for The Negro (2002), Scoop IV (1995) and Les grands procès (1993).
biography.name: Serge Bradet

biography.bio: Gaston Caron is an actor, known for Gaz Bar Blues (2003), Post Mortem (1999) and Whitewash (2013).
biography.name: Gaston Caron
